title: LR circuit - equivalent resistance at steady state

content.question: A battery, a switch, two identical resistors, and an inductor are connected as shown in the figure. After the switch is closed, the system is allowed to reach steady state. What is the equivalent resistance of the circuit when it has reached steady state?
